holidays.title: National Daughters Day
holidays.description: Celebrate and cherish daughters who bring so much love and into our lives.

holidays.title: National Lobster Day
holidays.description: A fine delicacy throughout most of the world, the crowd-pleasing crustacean has seen darker days.

holidays.title: Bathukamma Starting Day
holidays.description: Bathukamma is a day that honors the gods for the blessings they have bestowed upon us.

holidays.title: Binge Day
holidays.description: Ready for a lazy, relaxing day? Grab some popcorn and snacks before we begin.

holidays.title: Death of Prophet Muhammed
holidays.description: Take time to reflect on the teachings of the Prophet Muhammad as we honor his death.

holidays.title: German Butterbrot Day
holidays.description: Get the bread, get the butter, it’s time to celebrate German Butterbrot Day!

holidays.title: Gold Star Mother’s and Family Day
holidays.description: Honoring families of those who have received The Gold Star – the military award no one wants.

holidays.title: International Ataxia Awareness Day
holidays.description: A day to recognize the concentrated efforts in throwing light on this rare disease.

holidays.title: Mahalaya
holidays.description: West Bengal, Odisha, Karnataka, and Tripura, your time has come to celebrate Mahalaya.

holidays.title: Martyrdom of Imam Reza
holidays.description: Mourners, pay respect to the revered Shia Imam on the day of the Martyrdom of Imam Reza.

holidays.title: Math Storytelling Day
holidays.description: A fun and interesting way to celebrate a subject typically feared by many.

holidays.title: National Comic Book Day
holidays.description: It’s a bird! It’s a plane! No, it’s... National Comic Book Day!

holidays.title: National Cooking Day
holidays.description: Slow down and enjoy preparing your own food — and the joy of eating it!

holidays.title: National Food Service Employee Day
holidays.description: Visit your local restaurant and show your appreciation for the staff that does it all.

holidays.title: National John Day
holidays.description: Is your name John? Join us as we celebrate your name day today!

holidays.title: National One-Hit Wonder Day
holidays.description: Start making your throwback playlists as we pay homage to our one-hit wonders!

holidays.title: National Psychotherapy Day
holidays.description: A recognition day for a treatment that helps to alleviate stress and mental problems.

holidays.title: National Quesadilla Day
holidays.description: Get your plates and forks ready as we celebrate this delicious Mexican dish.

holidays.title: National Roadkill Day
holidays.description: A sustainable way to feed America and clean the streets — it’s National Roadkill Day!

holidays.title: National Tune-Up Day
holidays.description: Prepare the house for the cold winter months.

holidays.title: National Wade Day
holidays.description: Wade is a popular masculine name of Anglo-Saxon origin with a peculiar meaning.

holidays.title: National YogaFit Day
holidays.description: Get your mats ready for National YogaFit Day and attain physical and mental fitness!

holidays.title: One-Hit Wonder Day
holidays.description: Ever wondered how you know the lyrics to songs that have been around longer than you have?

holidays.title: Research Administrator Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the administrators who put in hard work to conduct important research.

holidays.title: Rosh Hashanah
holidays.description: Rosh Hashanah, literally translating to ‘head of the year’, is the Jewish New Year.

holidays.title: World Day of The Deaf
holidays.description: Let's celebrate the achievements of deaf people, as we help create a safer environment for them.

holidays.title: World Dream Day
holidays.description: Calling all dreamers, achievers, and go-getters; this is the day for you.

holidays.title: World Pharmacists Day
holidays.description: We're shedding light on how Pharmacists Day came to be and sharing fun ideas to celebrate.

holidays.title: World Rivers Day
holidays.description: Observe World Rivers Day by educating yourself and getting involved in clean-up drives.

holidays.title: World’s Largest Pet Walk
holidays.description: Lace up your walking shoes today and get ready for World’s Largest Pet Walk!

holidays.title: Barbara Walters’s Birthday
holidays.description: The possibilities are endless for this incredibly gifted and award-winning journalist, author, and actor.

holidays.title: Donald Glover’s Birthday
holidays.description: The talent of this actor, rapper, comedian, writer, and producer truly knows no bounds.

holidays.title: Jayda Cheaves’s Birthday
holidays.description: The epitome of ‘follow your heart’ is social media celebrity, YouTuber, and businesswoman, Jayda Cheaves.

holidays.title: Mark Hamill’s Birthday
holidays.description: This exceptionally talented, award-winning actor and voice artist is a true inspiration to all.

holidays.title: T.I.’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this exceptionally talented, award-winning rapper, record executive, and actor, the sky’s the limit.

holidays.title: Will Smith’s Birthday
holidays.description: This phenomenal, award-winning American actor, musician, and songwriter has experienced a brilliant career.
